name: Dangerous Lies Love Game
description:
Are you searching for the perfect choice game in which you can experience love like no other? Here is a life choice game that will fulfill all your expectations and it's called Highschool Dangerous Lies: Teen Story-Love Game.

Play High School Dangerous Lies: Teen Story-Love Game and become the main role in this choice and consequence game. Take control of your life and the choices you make and create your own story of love and romance. The teenage adventure is waiting for you in this thrilling interactive visual novel game!

Will you experience the love at first sight, or are you just looking for a casual fling with no strings attached? Have you stumbled upon the Mr Right, or is there someone who is a better love choice? Do you have true friends who are loyal to you, or are they just pretending and waiting to stab you in the back? How are you going to deal with your responsibilities related to your school and grades? It all depends on the choices you make throughout the game.
